mapper.insert: insert into position (positionId, positionName, workPlace, positionMajor, numbers, createTime, state, positionDuty, qualification, xueli,positionSort,columnId) values (#{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionmajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionduty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{qualification,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{xueli,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{positionsort,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{columnid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update position set positionName = #{positionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workPlace = #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positionMajor = #{positionmajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numbers = #{numbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, positionDuty = #{positionduty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, xueli = #{xueli,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, positionSort = #{positionsort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, columnId = #{columnid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where positionId = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select positionId, positionName, workPlace, positionMajor, numbers, createTime, state, positionDuty, qualification, xueli,positionSort,columnId from position where positionId = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select positionId, positionName, workPlace, positionMajor, numbers, createTime, state, positionDuty, qualification, xueli,positionSort,columnId from position
select positionId, positionName, workPlace, positionMajor, numbers, createTime, state, positionDuty, qualification, xueli,positionSort,columnId from position where state = 1

select positionId, positionName, workPlace, positionMajor, numbers, createTime, state, positionDuty, qualification, xueli,positionSort,columnId from position where ((positionName like concat('%',#{nameorworkplace},'%')) or (workPlace like concat('%',#{nameorworkplace},'%'))) and state = 1;

select positionId, positionName, workPlace, positionMajor, numbers, createTime, state, positionDuty, qualification, xueli,positionSort,columnId from position where columnId = #{columnid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = 1;
